author: Michael Liedtke
title: Pandemic and chill: NETFLIX adds 16M subscribers...
description: BERKELEY, Calif. (AP) — Netflix picked up nearly 16 million global subscribers during the first three months of the year, helping cement its status as one of the world's most essential services in...
content:
BERKELEY, Calif. (AP) Netflix picked up nearly 16 million global subscribers during the first three months of the year, helping cement its status as one of the worlds most essential services in times of isolation or crisis.
